medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient reports having had 3 days of watery, nonbloody diarrhea last week and intermittent fevers since that time. Denies associated symptoms and notes some anorexia with less oral intake over the past 7 days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Renal cell carcinoma, bladder cancer, osteoporosis, multinodular goiter, endometriosis.
